original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa🔽Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.82. Sanidassanattika, Savitakkaduka🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nasavitakko🔽dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho🔽nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa  dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  sa ni dassana ttika sa vitakka duka  anidassana appaṭigham sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana appaṭighaḥ na sa vitakkaḥ  dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham sa vitakkam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ  na sa vitakkaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pe anidassana appaṭigham sa vitakkam dhamma

original: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasavitakko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasavitakko🔽ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.🔽Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naavitakko
analyzed: paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sa vitakko ca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na sa vitakko 🔽ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā 🔽hetuyā cha ārammaṇe tīṇi pe avigate cha 🔽a nidassana appaṭigham avitakkam dhammam paṭicca na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na avitakkaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho🔽naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham avitakkam dhammam paṭicca na anidassana sappaṭighaḥ  na avitakkaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā anidassana appaṭigham avitakkam dhammam paṭicca
translated: A non-evident, non-obstructing, non-tactile object arises …🔽A non-tactile object arises …

original: nasanidassanasappaṭigho naavitakko ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naavitakko ca dhammā🔽uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na a vitakkaḥ ca na a nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na a vitakkaḥ ca dhammā  uppajjanti hetu paccayā
translated: A non-evident, non-obstructing, non-tactile object and a non-tactile object arise …🔽(In brief.)
With respect to cause, there are three … With respect to the unobscured, there are three …
